DOC.brief_summary: The long-term goal program research develop disseminate efficacious , group-based distress tolerance treatment weight concern ( DT-W ) significantly increase smoke cessation rate among woman . The objective project conduct preliminary randomize control trial ( RCT ) ( N = 60 ) compare DT-W Health Education ( HE ) comparison intervention , group also receive standard behavioral smoking cessation treatment ( ST ) include counsel transdermal nicotine patch ( TNP ) , examine potential mechanism may underlie efficacy DT-W improve smoke outcomes 1- , 3- , 6-month follow-up .
